thread.title: TripAdvisor names the world's best beaches for 2017
thread.title_full: TripAdvisor names the world's best beaches for 2017

title: TripAdvisor names the world's best beaches for 2017
text: TripAdvisor names the world's best beaches for 2017 TripAdvisor has announced the winners of its 2017 Travelers' Choice awards for beaches. The rankings were determined based on reviews and ratings collected in a single year from TripAdvisor users worldwide. Siesta Beach in Siesta Key, Fla., is ranked the No. 1 beach in the U.S. Post to Facebook TripAdvisor names the world's best beaches for 2017 TripAdvisor has announced the winners of its 2017 Travelers' Choice awards for beaches. The rankings were determined based on reviews and ratings collected in a single year from TripAdvisor users worldwide. Siesta Beach in Siesta Key, Fla., is ranked the No. 1 beach in the U.S.  //usat.ly/2m7y7JL   Join the Nation's Conversation To   TripAdvisor names the world's best beaches for 2017 None TripAdvisor has announced the winners of its 2017 Travelers' Choice awards for beaches. The rankings were determined based on reviews and ratings collected in a single year from TripAdvisor users worldwide.
